name: Rock Heroes: A new rhythm game
name_original: Rock Heroes: A new rhythm game
description:
Are you ready to music world? Tap your way through the songs with this easy to learn rhythm game.
Download the best guitar style game, test your skills playing the guitar and follow the rhythm of the music.
Hit the notes at the right time to get the highest score!
You can use headphone to get better gameplay.
All the play is free,go and try it now!!!

Features:
• Better controls and gameplay!
• Visually striking user interface.
• Beautiful graphics.
• Song analysis.
